chapters.title: Chapter 27: Friendly Fire
chapters.info: Ashmanaille, p. 487—Lanky Aes Sedai of the Gray Ajah. She served as one of the Sitters for the Gray for the Tower in exile. She is strong in Earth, and is one of the sisters Egwene had trying to make cuendillar. She is unusually attentive to her clothing and virtually emotionless. She has dark hair, brown eyes, a narrow face, and a small build. She is friends with Phaedrine. She still remembers Min as Elmindreda, the witless girl hiding in the Tower from two suitors.
